result.name: Fixed Version of Head in the Stars - Roblox Theme
result.description: This is the fixed version of the original, now the background works. All credits go to >elixeria< for the colour choices and screenshot and >Dabin - the owner of this, it's actually a cover for an album, click this sentence to go to the song, it's not too bad at all<, oskadesign was the artist, they seem to have removed themselves from the internet though. This code was created by me, do give feedback for improvements in the comments. If you want more fixed roblox styles just click BoopBop at the top, or you can click DittoDino below for some mediocre youtube progressbars.
result.notes: This is the Alt of DittoDino. Disclaimers: Tablets/iPads or phones won't work, Chrome & Opera are the only browsers that work well with the extension. Press 'Read more' for further help. Help Sections Links Below. English Help Section. Turkish Translated Help Section - Yardım bölümü Türkçe'ye çevrildi. French Translated Help Section - Section d'aide traduite en français - cliquez ici. Russian/Cyrillic Translated Help Section - Русский/кириллица переведенный раздел помощи - кликните сюда. Spanish Translated Help Section - Sección de ayuda traducida al español - haga clic aquí. The original theme was this Head in the Stars. It's a link. 17 August 2022 - Released. 26 February 2023 - Updated with the base code, so themes don't change the text, made the colours fit with the background. 17 April 2023 - Updated once again with an improved version of the base code. 21 August 2023 - A very late 1st anniversary, thanks for the 26k installs.
